parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  contents: [{
    parts: [{
      text: `Analiza el siguiente comentario de una encuesta de satisfacci√≥n de CapiBobba (bubble tea + capigofres).

RATING: ${$json.rating}/5 estrellas
COMENTARIO: "${$json.comment}"

Genera un an√°lisis JSON detallado (SOLO el JSON, sin markdown):

{
  "sentiment": "positive|neutral|negative|very_negative",
  "sentiment_score": 0.0-1.0,
  "topics": ["product_quality", "delivery_time", "customer_service", "price", "presentation", "taste", "temperature"],
  "key_phrases": ["frase relevante del comentario"],
  "urgency": "low|medium|high|critical",
  "actionable": true|false,
  "action_type": "response_needed|investigation|improvement|none",
  "summary_es": "Resumen en espa√±ol (1-2 l√≠neas)",
  "customer_intent": "complaint|suggestion|praise|question",
  "nps_alignment": "detractor|passive|promoter"
}

CONTEXTO:
- Rating 1-2: T√≠picamente negativo (detractores)
- Rating 3: Neutral (pasivos)
- Rating 4-5: Positivo (promotores)
- CapiBobba vende: bubble tea, waffles de capibara, postres

REGLAS:
- Si rating ‚â§2 pero comentario es positivo ‚Üí sentiment=negative, urgency=high (sarcasmo o problema)
- Si rating ‚â•4 pero comentario es negativo ‚Üí urgency=high (expectativas no cumplidas)
- topics: m√°ximo 3 temas m√°s relevantes
- key_phrases: extraer frases textuales (max 3)
- urgency: critical si rating=1 O palabras como "p√©simo", "nunca m√°s", "horrible"
- nps_alignment debe coincidir con el rating (1-2=detractor, 3=passive, 4-5=promoter)`
    }]
  }],
  generationConfig: {
    temperature: 0.3,
    topK: 1,
    topP: 0.95,
    maxOutputTokens: 500,
    responseMimeType: 'application/json'
  }
}) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({
  from: $json.from,
  timestamp: $json.timestamp,
  rating: $json.rating,
  comment: $json.comment,
  sentiment: $json.sentiment_analysis?.sentiment || 'unknown',
  sentiment_score: $json.sentiment_analysis?.sentiment_score || 0,
  topics: $json.sentiment_analysis?.topics || [],
  key_phrases: $json.sentiment_analysis?.key_phrases || [],
  urgency: $json.sentiment_analysis?.urgency || 'low',
  actionable: $json.sentiment_analysis?.actionable || false,
  action_type: $json.sentiment_analysis?.action_type || 'none',
  summary_es: $json.sentiment_analysis?.summary_es || '',
  customer_intent: $json.sentiment_analysis?.customer_intent || 'unknown',
  nps_alignment: $json.sentiment_analysis?.nps_alignment || 'passive',
  processed_at: $json.processed_at
}) }}

meta.description: An√°lisis de sentimientos para comentarios de encuestas de CapiBobba usando Gemini AI
